thread.title: Kanye West Throws Kim Kardashian Movie-Themed Birthday Bash
thread.title_full: Kanye West Throws Kim Kardashian Movie-Themed Birthday Bash

title: Kanye West Throws Kim Kardashian Movie-Themed Birthday Bash
text:
Kanye West Throws Kim Kardashian Movie-Themed Birthday Bash Posted just a moment ago 
ABC/Randy Holmes (LOS ANGELES) -- Kim Kardashian turned 35 on Wednesday, and her hubby Kanye West marked the occasion by throwing her a surprise birthday. 
The 38-year-old rapper invited the Kardashian clan for a special viewing of the film Romeo and Juliet at the Westlake Cinepolis theater in Los Angeles, a source tells Us Weekly . Mom Kris Jenner arrived hand-in-hand with her boyfriend, Corey Gamble. Sister Kourtney Kardashian, stepsisters Kendall and Kylie Jenner, Tyga and Caitlyn Jenner were also on hand. 
"All the gifts were wrapped in black and white," the onlooker told the magazine. In addition, white floral arrangements were set up at each table outside. 
When Kim and Kanye entered the theater, people cheered and sang "Happy Birthday," adds the source. 
The party-goers reportedly munched on churros and took pictures in front of the white flower-covered walls and silver K-shaped balloons. 
Keeping Up with the Kardashians returns November 15 on E!
